EmailTemplate.description: Your Menu Update request has been received and will be processed ASAP
EmailTemplate.name: FP TW Menu Change - Update Request
EmailTemplate.subject: 我們已收到您菜單更新的需求
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
親愛的foodpanda夥伴，
感謝您的提供，我們已收到您菜單更新的相關資訊並將盡快於24小時內回覆您。
有任何問題都歡迎與我們聯繫， foodpanda團隊 (# {!Case.CaseNumber})
